App.title: Compare And Decide
components.overview.step1: List all items from which you want to decide from with its attribute
components.overview.step2: Select one prefered item based on intution
components.overview.step3: Now compare the current prefered item with each item one at a time. In each comparasion choose one item you prefer and eliminate other until all items are compared
components.overview.step4: Last prefered item remaining will be your choice. Hurray you have made the decision
components.overview.title: Make Decision in Three Easy Steps
